data.name: Aria_pagecache_blocks_not_flushed
data.type: the number of dirty blocks in the aria page cache.

data.name: Aria_pagecache_blocks_unused
data.type: free blocks in the aria page cache.

data.name: Aria_pagecache_blocks_used
data.type: blocks used in the aria page cache.

data.name: Aria_pagecache_read_requests
data.type: the number of requests to read something from the aria page cache.

data.name: Aria_pagecache_reads
data.type: the number of aria page cache read requests that caused a block to be read from the disk.

data.name: Aria_pagecache_write_requests
data.type: the number of requests to write a block to the aria page cache.

data.name: Aria_pagecache_writes
data.type: the number of blocks written to disk from the aria page cache.

data.name: Aria_transaction_log_syncs
data.type: the number of aria log fsyncs.
